raw_body: COORAY – MONICA – (nee FERNANDO) – (Formerly of CEB). Wife of Ranjith Cooray,​ beloved mother of Sajith (Your Way Travels),​ mother-in-law of Avanthi,​ grandmother of Dulithi,​ Ranith and Ramith,​ sister of Marie Livera,​ Dulsy Nonis,​ Jesica Fernando,​ Manel Fernando and late Gamini Fernando,​ sister-in-law of late Nimal,​ Ashoka Cooray and Chandrani Gunawardana. Remains lie at Residence No. 468,​ Nawala Road,​ Rajagiriya. Cortege will leave residence at 3.00 p.m. on Sunday,​ 17th September 2023. Burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella (Anglican Section) at 4.30 p.m. No. 468,​ Nawala Road,​ Rajagiriya.059004
